alert.note: Alert for Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:03PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Waukesha County through 530 PM CDT... At 503 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wales, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waukesha, New Berlin, Menomonee Falls, Pewaukee, Sussex, Hartland, Delafield, Wales, Brookfield, Lapham Peak St Park, and Genesee Depot. This includes Interstate 94 between mile markers 286 and 300. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
